prerequisite: Wizard, one or more illusion powers
name: Shadow Shaper
text: Illusions trick the mind to evoke physical results. You have found that the interplay of shadow and illusion makes spectral images into true threats. You delight in tricking both the minds and bodies of your foes, constantly blurring the line between what is illusion and what is real.

features.mindAndBody(11thLevel): Any illusion attack powers you use that target Will can target Fortitude instead
features.nightTerror(11thLevel): You gain the night terror power
features.nightmaresMadeReal(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to use a 1st-level at-will illusion attack power against a single target, the attack deals maximum damage if it hits
features.never-endingNightmare(12thLevel): You gain the never-ending nightmare power
features.spectralDominance(16thLevel): While an enemy is subject to the effect of any of your illusion attacks, you gain combat advantage against that enemy
